name: BoxOut!
description:
BoxOut! is a local two player boxing game where you and a friend battle by using all means necessary to outsmart and push each other off the stage. Use combinations of moves to execute different moves and literally turn the game around!

Grab your phone, invite a friend, and compete for the ultimate price: Eternal fame!

Available for free in the Google Play store

We are developing this game as part of our Game Design & Development minor in Rotterdam. Any feedback is therefore highly appreciated!
